metadata.title: USN-4506-1 -- MCabber vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that MCabber does not properly manage roster pushes. An attacker could possibly use this issue to remotely perform  machine-in-the-middle attacks. (CVE-2016-9928).  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4506-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  mcabber - 0.10.2-1+deb8u1build0.16.04.1 No subscription required
